resources.string: The operation of the application need necessary permissions
The current application of lack of necessary permissions. please click on the Settings open the required permissions. the last click the back button twice, then return.
Current applications require the use of location permissions, if is not granted, positioning function will not be able to use
Current applications require the use of sensor permissions, if is not granted, some functions will not be able to use
The current application permissions to read and write need to use memory card, if you do not grant access, some functions will not be able to use
The current application need to use the camera, if you do not grant access, sweep code function will not be able to use
The current application need to use the camera, if you do not grant access, upload function will not be able to use
The current application need to use the camera, if we do not grant permission, will not be able to use camera function
Current application need to use the directory permissions, if is not granted, will not be able to directly obtain references from communication phone number
You have banned location permissions, and check the stop asking, please go to the Settings in open position permissions, otherwise it will affect your normal use
You have been banned directory permissions, and check the stop asking, please go to the Settings inside to open the directory permissions, otherwise it will affect your normal use
You have banned camera permissions, and check the stop asking, please to set the permissions of opening the camera inside, otherwise it will affect your normal use
Permissions you have banned sensor, and check the stop asking, please go to the permissions set inside open sensor, otherwise it will affect your normal use
You have banned memory card access, and check the stop asking, please go to set permissions inside to open the memory card, otherwise it will affect your normal use
